name: Vapirefreaks.com - remove products ads.
description:
Remember the good old days, before Jet put the gay ass product ads on?
You can't really block them with AB+, so I made a really, really, REALLY simple CSS script for it.

*/Note, this doesn't remove the normal ads.
For that, I'd reccomend Ad Block+ or this
http://userstyles.org/styles/9100



made by 42
